_description: Planned work backlog. Ordered by priority. Pull into active_work.json when starting.

queue.title: Add 20+ new comparison pairs to Airtable and publish
queue.reason: More comparison pages = more long-tail SEO traffic. Each '[Tool A] vs [Tool B]' query is a low-competition keyword.

queue.title: Generate individual tool detail pages for all 30 tools
queue.reason: Tool pages drive '[tool name] review' search queries. Currently only Clay and Instantly have reviews.

queue.title: Build 'Best X Tools' listicle pages
queue.reason: 'Best cold outreach tools 2026' is high-volume search query. 10 listicle pages (one per category).

queue.title: Add email capture backend (ConvertKit or Beehiiv)
queue.reason: Newsletter form on homepage doesn't connect to anything. Email list = owned audience.

queue.title: Build Data Agent (Browse AI + Make.com)
queue.reason: Automated tool discovery from G2/Capterra/Product Hunt. Currently all 30 tools were manually entered.

queue.title: Extend publish.js to handle tool pages and category updates
queue.reason: Currently publish.js only handles comparisons. Should also auto-generate tool review pages and update category pages when new tools are added.

queue.title: Add internal linking strategy
queue.reason: Cross-link comparison pages to relevant category pages and tool reviews. Improves SEO crawlability and time-on-site.

queue.title: Performance optimization (lazy loading, minified CSS)
queue.reason: Page speed affects SEO ranking. Not critical until traffic grows.
